objects.text:
• 16.3MP APS-C X-Trans CMOS II sensor
• Classic retro design with premium build
• Fast AF system with 77 points

product_details.name: Fujifilm X-T10 Mirrorless Camera | Professional Photography Made Accessible
product_details.description:
• Classic retro-styled design with premium build quality and ergonomic handling
• Advanced 16.3MP APS-C X-Trans CMOS II sensor for exceptional image quality
• Fast and precise autofocus system with 77 AF points
• Built-in electronic viewfinder (EVF) with 2.36M-dot resolution
• Tiltable 3-inch LCD screen for creative shooting angles
• Film Simulation modes including CLASSIC CHROME
• Full HD 1080p video recording capability
• Built-in Wi-Fi connectivity for easy photo sharing
• Compatible with Fujifilm's extensive X-mount lens system
• Compact and lightweight design perfect for travel photography
• Real-time manual controls with dedicated dials for shutter speed, exposure compensation, and drive modes
• High-performance electronic shutter with 1/32000 sec speed

banner_details:
This banner features a bold promotional design ideal for product advertising, specifically a camera, with a modern, high-contrast layout. The design is split into two halves: the left side contains layered text elements, and the right side highlights the product image. The background is composed of deep charcoal and black tones with abstract orange-red and gold graphical accents. Key text elements include a white headline (`heading`), a red promotional tagline (`tagline`), and a clean feature list in white (`description`). Below, a bright orange price tag (`price`) is followed by urgency-driven subtext (`subheading`). The call-to-action button (`cta_background` and `cta`) is bold in red with white text. 

**Color Palette:**
- Charcoal Black: `#1A1A1A`
- Dark Gray: `#232323`
- Bright Red: `#FF3B30`
- Vivid Orange: `#FF9500`
- White: `#FFFFFF`
product_color: The product image of the Fujifilm X-T10 camera features a sleek, modern color palette dominated by deep matte black (#1C1C1C) and dark gunmetal gray (#2F2F2F), giving it a professional and sophisticated look. The lens glass subtly reflects hints of teal green (#6DC1B3), amber yellow (#D6A746), and light grey (#D3D3D3), adding depth and vibrance. White text labels (#FFFFFF) across the dials and body create high contrast, enhancing readability. These colors are blended smoothly, with clean transitions between black tones and reflective highlights, ensuring sharp focus areas. For a banner, using black, white, amber, and teal accents will convey elegance and premium quality.
